txt.en: 'Are you ready to be \qKindred\q with Limlight Gorge?\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon you will be Kindred of the Limlight Gorge. Ready?'
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue.
By completing this quest, you will be considered Kindred with Limlight Gorge.
